p: At present, no specific antiviral treatment and no efficient vaccines are available for COVID-19 in humans. Recently, two familiar broad-spectrum antiviral drugs remdesivir and favipiravir have been tested against clinical isolate of COVID-2019 in vitro. They found that EC 90 of a remdesivir, an adenosine analogue, as 1.76 μM which can be achieved in non-human primate studies. Moreover, their preliminary data showed that it inhibits COVID-19 virus infection also in human liver cancer (Huh-7) cells.
